effect.Name: Correction With Floating Modulus (Switch)
effect.description: Base or blend colors are reduced by the floating modulus function.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Correction With Floating Modulus (Switch) Shader | 1.0 (30.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Base or blend colors are reduced by the floating modulus function.

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable manages which color will be reduced. Set to 0 is the blend color will be reduced and set to 1 is the base color will be reduced.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Denom
parameter.description: This variable represents the denominator used in the floating-point modulus operation, determining the divisor in the function.
